creator: rineau+apachebugzilla@quatramaran.ens.fr
text:
At the page http://httpd.apache.org/docs/mod/core.html (in english or french), the following link:

See the filter section on performance hints for more information.

is broken. It should points to ../misc/perf-bsd44.html instead.
Thanks for the report.  This will be fixed in the next release of the docs.
creator: slive@apache.org
